remarks: Show that the support of a function is contained in a set.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Jun-2017.)
statement:
suppss2f.p $e |- F/ k ph $.
suppss2f.a $e |- F/_ k A $.
suppss2f.w $e |- F/_ k W $.
suppss2f.n $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( A \ W ) ) -> B = Z ) $.
suppss2f $p |- ( ph -> ( `' ( k e. A |-> B ) " ( _V \ { Z } ) ) C_ W ) $.
$d Z k $.
